parameters.name: SortOrderIndex
parameters.description: 0 for primary sort, 1 for secondary sort, 2 for tertiary sort (see Remarks )

title: IBomTableSortData.Ascending
description: Gets and sets whether this is an ascending sort for the specified sort order index.

parameters.name: SortOrderIndex
parameters.description: 0 for primary sort, 1 for secondary sort, 2 for tertiary sort (see Remarks )

returns: True if sort is ascending, false if descending
remarks: BOM tables may be sorted by up to three columns. This property maps the sort order index with a sorting direction (ascending or descending). Call this property three times to set the sorting directions of all three sort order indexes.
